about_the_game:
Gorb's family has a special destiny. When his mom catches him recording an embarrassing dance tutorial, she knows that he is ready. She hands him a magic ribbon that can open portals and sends him to space. He must now travel through the galaxy and defeat his opponents... in epic DANCE BATTLES!

Portal to the Cosmobeat is a narrative-driven Dance Game featuring unconventional movement controls.
Use the keys on your keyboard to select a limb of your choice and now... move your mouse to dance. Sounds easy to you? Prove it!




  • Open portals with your magic ribbon and travel through the galaxy.
    You will challenge the best dancers in the universe while listening to the freshest beats!
  • Currently, the game contains one Level (aside from our immersive tutorial), featuring two unique Techno-inspired tracks, which are gonna get stuck in your head.




  • Follow Gorb on his quest through the galaxy with hilarious dialogue and engaging cutscenes.
  • Expect the unexpected, when Gorb bravely challenges Techno DJ Ring to a dance battle and stay tuned for future opponents!




  • Use our game's unique mechanic and dance Gorb to the top!
  • Enjoy Gorb's clumsy dance moves with more than 3 unique choreographies and freestyle sections.
  • Reach a new highscore and achieve GORBLIKE ratings!

Portal to the Cosmobeat is a narrative-driven Dance Game featuring unconventional movement controls.
Use the keys on your keyboard to select a limb of your choice and now... move your mouse to dance. Sounds easy to you? Prove it!

    You will challenge the best dancers in the universe while listening to the freshest beats!
  • Currently, the game contains one Level (aside from our immersive tutorial), featuring two unique Techno-inspired tracks, which are gonna get stuck in your head.




  • Follow Gorb on his quest through the galaxy with hilarious dialogue and engaging cutscenes.
  • Expect the unexpected, when Gorb bravely challenges Techno DJ Ring to a dance battle and stay tuned for future opponents!




  • Use our game's unique mechanic and dance Gorb to the top!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790S; AMD Ryzen 7 1800X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950; Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Portal to the Cosmobeat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790S; AMD Ryzen 7 1800X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950; Radeon RX 560
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: On his mission, to become the very best dancer ever, Gorb challenges incredible dance coaches all around the galaxy. Unfortunately, he is terrible. Can you dance him to the top?
